title: "70s" Caslon swash font...Jukebox to the rescue
content: A about a month ago someone posted this image asking if it was a digital font. It will soon be a new digital font from Jukebox. I went bananas when I saw this because I thought it was so cool! Thanks to Mark Simonson who provided me with a usable sample, this font is currently in production as "Cabernet Italic & Italic Swash" It should be available from Veer sometime later this summer. Enjoy... ![Caslon Black sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20110513090014im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/36531.jpg)
author: anonymous

comments.content:
Now _that's_ great news Jason. Thanks for keeping us posted,   
I really appreciate it. Hmmmm... looks yummy.
Yep, that's the original Fontdude. Now the italic... ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20110513090014im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
